EmailTemplate.subject: AeroCruze 230 Touchscreen Autopilot Now Certified
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://www.bendixking.com/]]>
One of the three highly-anticipated BendixKing cockpit upgrades is now FAA certified <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/news-listing/2019/july/bendixking-receives-certification-for-three-highly-anticipated-cockpit-upgrades]]>: the AeroCruze 230 <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/products/aerocruze-230]]> touchscreen autopilot.
- Form-fit replacement for the KFC 150 autopilot - Attitude input from approved source - Standard 2-axis; 3-axis available with optional yaw damper - GPSS (GPS roll steering), VS, IAS - GPS/ILS/VOR tracking and approaches - Altitude pre-select / alerter - Uses existing servos and wiring, saving installation costs and downtime
“BendixKing strives to give owners the opportunity to bring more advanced technology into their aircraft at an affordable price,” said Gregg Cohen, president, BendixKing. “With the new certifications, operators can not only modernize their cockpit, but in doing so, enhance the safety and efficiency of their aircraft.”
